   19: %%
   20: -module(unicode_util_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0, extra/1,
   25:          uppercase/1, lowercase/1, titlecase/1, casefold/1,
   26:          cp/1, gc/1,
   27:          nfd/1, nfc/1, nfkd/1, nfkc/1,
   28:          whitespace/1,
   29:          get/1,
   30:          lookup/1,
   31:          count/1]).
   32: 
   33: -export([debug/0, id/1, bin_split/1, uc_loaded_size/0,
   34:         time_count/4  %% Used by stdlib_bench_SUITE
   35:         ]).
   36: 
   37: suite() ->
   38:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   39:      {timetrap,{minutes,20}}].
   40: 
   41: all() ->
   42:     [
   43:      extra,
   44:      uppercase, lowercase, titlecase, casefold,
   45:      cp, gc,
   46:      nfd, nfc, nfkd, nfkc,
   47:      whitespace,
   48:      get,
   49:      lookup,
   50:      count
   51:     ].
   52: 
   53: debug() ->
   54:     Config = [{data_dir, ?MODULE_STRING++"_data"}],
   55:     [io:format("~p:~p~n",[Test,?MODULE:Test(Config)]) || Test <- all()].
   56: 
   57: extra(_) ->
   58:     {_, _} = unicode_util:spec_version(),
   59:     #{ccc:=0, compat:=[], canon:=[_,_]} = unicode_util:lookup($å),
   60:     #{fold:=229,lower:=229,title:=197,upper:=197} = unicode_util:get_case($å),
   61:     #{fold:="ss",lower:=223,title:="Ss",upper:="SS"} = unicode_util:get_case($ß),
   62:     ok.
   63: 
   64: uppercase(_) ->
   65:     [$H] = unicode_util:uppercase([$H]),
   66:     [$H] = unicode_util:uppercase([$h]),
   67:     [$1] = unicode_util:uppercase([$1]),
   68:     ok.
   69: 
   70: titlecase(_) ->
   71:     [$H] = unicode_util:titlecase([$H]),
   72:     [$H] = unicode_util:titlecase([$h]),
   73:     [$1] = unicode_util:titlecase([$1]),
   74:     ok.
   75: 
   76: lowercase(_) ->
   77:     [$h] = unicode_util:lowercase([$H]),
   78:     [$h] = unicode_util:lowercase([$h]),
   79:     [$1] = unicode_util:lowercase([$1]),
   80:     [$i] = unicode_util:casefold([$I]), %% no Turkish
   81:     ok.
   82: 
   83: casefold(_) ->
   84:     [$h] = unicode_util:casefold([$H]),
   85:     [$h] = unicode_util:casefold([$h]),
   86:     [$1] = unicode_util:casefold([$1]),
   87:     [$i] = unicode_util:casefold([$I]),%% no Turkish
   88:     [[$s,$s]|"abC"] = unicode_util:casefold([$ß,$a,$b,$C]),
   89:     [[$s,$s]] = unicode_util:casefold([$ẞ]),
   90:     ok.
   91: 
   92: whitespace(_) ->
   93:     WS = unicode_util:whitespace(),
   94:     WS = lists:filter(fun unicode_util:is_whitespace/1, WS),
   95:     false = unicode_util:is_whitespace($A),
   96:     ok.
   97: 
   98: cp(_) ->
   99:     Get = fun unicode_util:cp/1,
  100:     "hejsan" = fetch("hejsan", Get),
  101:     "hejsan" = fetch(<<"hejsan">>, Get),
  102:     "hejsan" = fetch(["hej",<<"san">>], Get),
  103:     "hejsan" = fetch(["hej"|<<"san">>], Get),
  104:     {error, <<128>>} = Get(<<128>>),
  105:     {error, [<<128>>, 0]} = Get([<<128>>, 0]),
  106: 
  107:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([-1]),
  108:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([-1, $a]),
  109:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([foo, $a]),
  110:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([-1, $a]),
  111:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([[], -1]),
  112:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([[-1], $a]),
  113:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([[-1, $a], $a]),
  114: 
  115:     ok.
  116: 
  117: gc(Config) ->
  118:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  119:     Get = fun unicode_util:gc/1,
  120:     "hejsan" = fetch("hejsan", Get),
  121:     "hejsan" = fetch(<<"hejsan">>, Get),
  122:     "hejsan" = fetch(["hej",<<"san">>], Get),
  123:     "hejsan" = fetch(["hej"|<<"san">>], Get),
  124:     {error, <<128>>} = Get(<<128>>),
  125:     {error, [<<128>>, 0]} = Get([<<128>>, 0]),
  126: 
  127:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([-1]),
  128:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([-1, $a]),
  129:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([foo, $a]),
  130:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([-1, $a]),
  131:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([[], -1]),
  132:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([[-1], $a]),
  133:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([[-1, $a], $a]),
  134:     {'EXIT', _} = catch Get([<<$a>>, [-1, $a], $a]), %% Current impl
  135: 
  136:     0 = fold(fun verify_gc/3, 0, DataDir ++ "/GraphemeBreakTest.txt"),
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: verify_gc(Line0, N, Acc) ->
  140:     Line = unicode:characters_to_list(Line0),
  141:     Line = fetch(Line0,fun unicode_util:cp/1), %% Test cp
  142:     LineGC = fetch(Line0,fun unicode_util:gc/1), %% Test gc
  143:     LineGC = fetch(Line,fun unicode_util:gc/1), %% Test gc
  144:     LineGC = fetch(LineGC,fun unicode_util:gc/1), %% Test gc
  145:     LineGC = fetch(LineGC,fun unicode_util:cp/1), %% Test cp
  146: 
  147:     %io:format("Line: ~s~n",[Line]),
  148:     [Data|_Comments] = string:tokens(Line, "#"),
  149:     %% io:format("Data: ~w~n",[string:tokens(Data, " \t")]),
  150:     {Str,Res} = gc_test_data(string:tokens(Data, " \t"), [], [[]]),
  151:     %% io:format("InputStr: ~w ~w~n",[Str,unicode:characters_to_binary(Str)]),
  152:     case verify_gc(Str, Res, N, Line) andalso
  153:         verify_gc(unicode:characters_to_binary(Str), Res, N, Line0) of
  154:         true -> Acc;
  155:         false -> Acc+1
  156:     end.
  157: 
  158: verify_gc({error,_,[CP|_]}=Err, _Res, N, Line) ->
  159:     IsSurrogate = 16#D800 =< CP andalso CP =< 16#DFFF,
  160:     %% Surrogat is not valid in utf8 encoding only utf16
  161:     IsSurrogate orelse
  162:         io:format("~w: ~ts~n Error in unicode:characters_to_binary ~w~n", [N, Line, Err]),
  163:     IsSurrogate;
  164: verify_gc(Str, Res, N, Line) ->
  165:     try fetch(Str, fun unicode_util:gc/1) of
  166:         Res -> true;
  167:         Other ->
  168:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[N, Line, Str, Str]),
  169:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [Res]),
  170:             io:format("Got: ~w~n", [Other]),
  171:             false
  172:     catch Cl:R:Stacktrace ->
  173:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[N, Line, Str]),
  174:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [Res]),
  175:             erlang:raise(Cl,R,Stacktrace)
  176:     end.
  177: 
  178: gc_test_data([[247]|Rest], Str, [First|GCs]) ->
  179:     case First of
  180:         [] -> gc_test_data(Rest, Str, [[]|GCs]);
  181:         [CP] -> gc_test_data(Rest, Str, [[],CP|GCs]);
  182:         _  -> gc_test_data(Rest, Str, [[],lists:reverse(First)|GCs])
  183:     end;
  184: gc_test_data([[215]|Rest], Str, GCs) ->
  185:     gc_test_data(Rest, Str, GCs);
  186: gc_test_data([Hex|Rest], Str, [First|GCs]) ->
  187:     CP = hex_to_int(Hex),
  188:     gc_test_data(Rest, [CP|Str], [[CP|First]|GCs]);
  189: gc_test_data([], Str, [[]|GCs]) ->
  190:     {lists:reverse(Str), lists:reverse(GCs)};
  191: gc_test_data([], Str, GCs) ->
  192:     {lists:reverse(Str), lists:reverse(GCs)}.
  193: 
  194: nfd(Config) ->
  195:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  196:     ok = fold(fun verify_nfd/3, 0, DataDir ++ "/NormalizationTest.txt"),
  197:     ok.
  198: 
  199: verify_nfd(<<"@Part", _/binary>>, _LineNo, _Acc) -> ok;
  200: verify_nfd(Data0, LineNo, _Acc) ->
  201:     Data1 = unicode:characters_to_list(Data0),
  202:     [Data2|_Comments] = string:tokens(Data1, "#"),
  203:     Columns = string:tokens(Data2, ";"),
  204:     [C1,C2,C3,C4,C5|_] = [[hex_to_int(CP) || CP <- string:tokens(C, " ")] ||
  205:                              C <- Columns],
  206:     C3GC = fetch(C3, fun unicode_util:gc/1),
  207:     try
  208:         C3GC = fetch(C1, fun unicode_util:nfd/1),
  209:         C3GC = fetch(C2, fun unicode_util:nfd/1),
  210:         C3GC = fetch(C3, fun unicode_util:nfd/1)
  211:     catch  _Cl:{badmatch, Other} = _R: Stacktrace ->
  212:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1, C1]),
  213:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C3GC, C3GC]),
  214:             io:format("Got: ~ts ~w~n", [Other, Other]),
  215:             erlang:raise(_Cl,_R,Stacktrace);
  216:            Cl:R:Stacktrace ->
  217:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  218:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C3]),
  219:             erlang:raise(Cl,R,Stacktrace)
  220:     end,
  221:     C5GC = fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:gc/1),
  222:     try
  223:         C5GC = fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:nfd/1),
  224:         C5GC = fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:nfd/1)
  225:     catch  _Cl2:{badmatch, Other2} = _R2:Stacktrace2 ->
  226:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1, C1]),
  227:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C5GC, C5GC]),
  228:             io:format("Got:      ~ts ~w~n", [Other2, Other2]),
  229:             erlang:raise(_Cl2,_R2,Stacktrace2);
  230:            Cl2:R2:Stacktrace2 ->
  231:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  232:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C5]),
  233:             erlang:raise(Cl2,R2,Stacktrace2)
  234:     end,
  235:     ok.
  236: 
  237: nfc(Config) ->
  238:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  239:     ok = fold(fun verify_nfc/3, 0, DataDir ++ "/NormalizationTest.txt"),
  240:     ok.
  241: 
  242: verify_nfc(<<"@Part", _/binary>>, _LineNo, _Acc) -> ok;
  243: verify_nfc(Data0, LineNo, _Acc) ->
  244:     Data1 = unicode:characters_to_list(Data0),
  245:     [Data2|_Comments] = string:tokens(Data1, "#"),
  246:     Columns = string:tokens(Data2, ";"),
  247:     [C1,C2,C3,C4,C5|_] = [[hex_to_int(CP) || CP <- string:tokens(C, " ")] ||
  248:                              C <- Columns],
  249:     C2GC = fetch(C2, fun unicode_util:gc/1),
  250:     try
  251:         C2GC = fetch(C1, fun unicode_util:nfc/1),
  252:         C2GC = fetch(C2, fun unicode_util:nfc/1),
  253:         C2GC = fetch(C3, fun unicode_util:nfc/1)
  254:     catch  _Cl:{badmatch, Other} = _R:Stacktrace ->
  255:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1, C1]),
  256:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C2GC, C2GC]),
  257:             io:format("Got:      ~ts ~w~n", [Other, Other]),
  258:             erlang:raise(_Cl,_R,Stacktrace);
  259:            Cl:R:Stacktrace ->
  260:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  261:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C3]),
  262:             erlang:raise(Cl,R,Stacktrace)
  263:     end,
  264:     C4GC = fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:gc/1),
  265:     try
  266:         C4GC = fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:nfc/1),
  267:         C4GC = fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:nfc/1)
  268:     catch  _Cl2:{badmatch, Other2} = _R2:Stacktrace2 ->
  269:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1, C1]),
  270:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C4GC, C4GC]),
  271:             io:format("Got: ~ts ~w~n", [Other2, Other2]),
  272:             erlang:raise(_Cl2,_R2,Stacktrace2);
  273:            Cl2:R2:Stacktrace2 ->
  274:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  275:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C5]),
  276:             erlang:raise(Cl2,R2,Stacktrace2)
  277:     end,
  278:     ok.
  279: 
  280: nfkd(Config) ->
  281:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  282:     ok = fold(fun verify_nfkd/3, 0, DataDir ++ "/NormalizationTest.txt"),
  283:     ok.
  284: 
  285: verify_nfkd(<<"@Part", _/binary>>, _LineNo, _Acc) -> ok;
  286: verify_nfkd(Data0, LineNo, _Acc) ->
  287:     Data1 = unicode:characters_to_list(Data0),
  288:     [Data2|_Comments] = string:tokens(Data1, "#"),
  289:     Columns = string:tokens(Data2, ";"),
  290:     [C1,C2,C3,C4,C5|_] = [[hex_to_int(CP) || CP <- string:tokens(C, " ")] ||
  291:                              C <- Columns],
  292:     C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:gc/1)),
  293:     try
  294:         C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C1, fun unicode_util:nfkd/1)),
  295:         C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C2, fun unicode_util:nfkd/1)),
  296:         C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C3, fun unicode_util:nfkd/1)),
  297:         C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:nfkd/1)),
  298:         C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:nfkd/1))
  299:     catch  _Cl:{badmatch, Other} = _R:Stacktrace ->
  300:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C5, C5]),
  301:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C5GC, C5GC]),
  302:             io:format("Got: ~ts ~w~n", [Other, Other]),
  303:             erlang:raise(_Cl,_R,Stacktrace);
  304:            Cl:R:Stacktrace ->
  305:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  306:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C3]),
  307:             erlang:raise(Cl,R,Stacktrace)
  308:     end,
  309:     ok.
  310: 
  311: 
  312: nfkc(Config) ->
  313:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  314:     ok = fold(fun verify_nfkc/3, 0, DataDir ++ "/NormalizationTest.txt"),
  315:     ok.
  316: 
  317: verify_nfkc(<<"@Part", _/binary>>, _LineNo, _Acc) -> ok;
  318: verify_nfkc(Data0, LineNo, _Acc) ->
  319:     Data1 = unicode:characters_to_list(Data0),
  320:     [Data2|_Comments] = string:tokens(Data1, "#"),
  321:     Columns = string:tokens(Data2, ";"),
  322:     [C1,C2,C3,C4,C5|_] = [[hex_to_int(CP) || CP <- string:tokens(C, " ")] ||
  323:                              C <- Columns],
  324:     C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:gc/1)),
  325:     try
  326:         C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C1, fun unicode_util:nfkc/1)),
  327:         C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C2, fun unicode_util:nfkc/1)),
  328:         C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C3, fun unicode_util:nfkc/1)),
  329:         C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:nfkc/1)),
  330:         C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:nfkc/1))
  331: 
  332:     catch  _Cl:{badmatch, Other} = _R:Stacktrace ->
  333:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C4, C4]),
  334:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C4GC, C4GC]),
  335:             io:format("Got:      ~ts ~w~n", [Other, Other]),
  336:             erlang:raise(_Cl,_R,Stacktrace);
  337:            Cl:R:Stacktrace ->
  338:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  339:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C3]),
  340:             erlang:raise(Cl,R,Stacktrace)
  341:     end,
  342:     ok.
  343: 
  344: get(_) ->
  345:     add_get_tests.
  346: 
  347: lookup(Config) ->
  348:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  349:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir, "unicode_table.bin")),
  350:     0 = check_category(0,  binary_to_term(Bin), 0),
  351:     ok.
  352: 
  353: check_category(Id, [{Id, {_, _, _, What}}|Rest], Es) ->
  354:     case maps:get(category, unicode_util:lookup(Id)) of
  355:         What -> check_category(Id+1, Rest, Es);
  356:         _Err ->
  357:             io:format("~w Exp: ~w Got ~w~n",[Id, What, _Err]), exit(_Err),
  358:             check_category(Id+1, Rest, Es+1)
  359:     end;
  360: check_category(Id, [{Next,_}|_] = Rest, Es) ->
  361:     case maps:get(category, unicode_util:lookup(Id)) of
  362:         {other, not_assigned} -> check_category(max(Id+1,Next-1), Rest, Es);
  363:         Err ->  io:format("~w Exp: {other, not_assigned} Got ~w~n",[Id,Err]),
  364:                 check_category(max(Id+1,Next-1), Rest, Es+1)
  365:     end;
  366: check_category(_Id, [], Es) ->
  367:     Es.
  368: 
  369: 
  370: count(Config) ->
  371:     Parent = self(),
  372:     Exec = fun() ->
  373:                    do_measure(Config),
  374:                    Parent ! {test_done, self()}
  375:            end,
  376:     ct:timetrap({minutes,5}),
  377:     case ct:get_timetrap_info() of
  378:         {_,{_,Scale}} when Scale > 1 ->
  379:             {skip,{measurments_skipped_debug,Scale}};
  380:         _ -> % No scaling, run at most 2 min
  381:             Tester = spawn(Exec),
  382:             receive {test_done, Tester} -> ok
  383:             after 120000 ->
  384:                     io:format("Timelimit reached stopping~n",[]),
  385:                     exit(Tester, die)
  386:             end,
  387:             ok
  388:     end.
  389: 
  390: do_measure(Config) ->
  391:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  392:     File =  DataDir ++ "/NormalizationTest.txt",
  393:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(File),
  394:     Do = fun(Func, Mode) ->
  395:                  {N, Mean, Stddev, Res} = time_count(Func, Mode, Bin, 10),
  396:                  io:format("~4w ~6w ~.10w ~.6wms ±~.2wms #~.2w~n",
  397:                            [Func, Mode, Res, Mean div 1000, Stddev div 1000, N])
  398:          end,
  399:     Do(lref, list),
  400:     Do(bref, binary),
  401:     io:format("----------------------~n"),
  402:     [Do(What,Mode) || What <- [cp, gc, nfd, nfc, nfkd, nfkc], Mode <- [list, deep_l, binary, deep_b]],
  403:     io:format("Size of unicode_util: ~pkB~n",[uc_loaded_size() div 1024]),
  404:     ok.
  405: 
  406: uc_loaded_size() ->
  407:     uc_loaded_size(binary:split(erlang:system_info(loaded), <<$\n>>, [global])).
  408: 
  409: uc_loaded_size([<<"unicode_util ", Rest/binary>>|_]) ->
  410:     [StrSize|_] = binary:split(Rest, <<$\s>>),
  411:     binary_to_integer(StrSize);
  412: uc_loaded_size([_|Rest]) ->
  413:     uc_loaded_size(Rest).
  414: 
  415: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  416: 
  417: time_count(Fun, Mode, Bin, Repeat) ->
  418:     timer:sleep(100), %% Let emulator catch up and clean things before test runs
  419:     Self = self(),
  420:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() ->
  421:                              Str = mode(Mode, Bin),
  422:                              Self ! {self(),do_count(0,0,0, Fun, Str, undefined, Repeat)}
  423:                      end),
  424:     receive {Pid,Msg} -> Msg end.
  425: 
  426: do_count(N,Sum,SumSq, Fun, Str, _, Repeat) when N < Repeat ->
  427:     {Time, Res} = do_count(Fun, Str),
  428:     do_count(N+1,Sum+Time,SumSq+Time*Time, Fun, Str, Res, Repeat);
  429: do_count(N,Sum,SumSq, _, _, Res, _) ->
  430:     Mean = round(Sum / N),
  431:     Stdev = round(math:sqrt((SumSq - (Sum*Sum/N))/(N - 1))),
  432:     {N, Mean, Stdev, Res}.
  433: 
  434: do_count(Fun, Str) ->
  435:     Count = fun Count(Str0, N) ->
  436:                     case unicode_util:Fun(Str0) of
  437:                         [] -> N;
  438:                         [_|Str1] -> Count(Str1,N+1)
  439:                     end
  440:             end,
  441: 
  442:     if Fun =/= lref, Fun =/= bref ->
  443:             timer:tc(fun() -> Count(Str, 0) end);
  444:        true ->
  445:             Pick = case Fun of
  446:                        lref -> id(id);
  447:                        bref -> id(bin_split)
  448:                    end,
  449:             Ref = fun LR(Str0, N) ->
  450:                           case ?MODULE:Pick(Str0) of
  451:                               [] -> N;
  452:                               [_|Str1] -> LR(Str1,N+1)
  453:                           end
  454:                   end,
  455:             timer:tc(fun() -> Ref(Str, 0) end)
  456:     end.
  457: 
  458: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  459: 
  460: 
  461: id(Op) -> Op.
  462: 
  463: bin_split(<<>>) -> [];
  464: bin_split(<<CP/utf8,R/binary>>) -> [CP|R].
  465: 
  466: mode(binary, Bin) -> Bin;
  467: mode(list, Bin) -> unicode:characters_to_list(Bin);
  468: mode(deep_b, Bin) -> [Bin];
  469: mode(deep_l, Bin) -> [unicode:characters_to_list(Bin)].
  470: 
  471: fetch(Str, F) ->
  472:     case F(Str) of
  473:         [] -> [];
  474:         [CP|R] ->
  475:             %% If input is a binary R should be binary
  476:             if is_binary(Str) == false -> ok;
  477:                is_binary(R); R =:= [] -> ok;
  478:                true ->
  479:                     io:format("Char: ~tc Tail:~tP~n", [CP,R,10]),
  480:                     exit({bug, F})
  481:             end,
  482:             [CP|fetch(R,F)]
  483:     end.
  484: 
  485: %% *Test.txt file helpers
  486: 
  487: hex_to_int([]) -> [];
  488: hex_to_int(HexStr) ->
  489:     list_to_integer(string:strip(HexStr, both), 16).
  490: 
  491: fold(Fun, Acc, File) ->
  492:     io:format("Processing ~s~n",[File]),
  493:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read, raw, binary, {read_ahead, 100000}]),
  494:     Get = fun() -> file:read_line(Fd) end,
  495:     try
  496:         fold_1(Fun, 1, Acc, Get)
  497:     after
  498:         ok = file:close(Fd)
  499:     end.
  500: 
  501: fold_1(Fun, Line, Acc, Get) ->
  502:     case Get() of
  503:         eof -> Acc;
  504:         {ok, <<"#",_/binary>>} -> %% Ignore comments
  505:             fold_1(Fun, Line+1, Acc, Get);
  506:         {ok, <<"\n">>} -> %% Ignore empty lines
  507:             fold_1(Fun, Line+1, Acc, Get);
  508:         {ok, Data} ->
  509:             fold_1(Fun, Line+1, Fun(Data, Line, Acc), Get)
  510:     end.
